attributes.action: Launch an Investigation into the waste of Tax Payers money in trying to sue a former employee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As reported in the national press and northeast local news, Northern Rock is pursuing Legal Action against a former employee (who has recently been sacked) to recover legal costs and damages for the stories that appeared in the press relating to Secret Bonuses and Branch Clsure Plans.  At the last count £130,000 in legal costs was the amount they had wasted of tax payers money.
